name: FeralHeart Unleashed
description:
Please use the https://itch.io/app to manage your updates.

FeralHeart Unleashed is a free-to-play role-playing MMO game where you can explore a vast online universe as several types of animal species! Express your endless creativity by creating your own stories and worlds, making new friends in a welcoming community, and showing off your true colors!

If you have any questions, feel free to join our discord! https://discord.gg/fhu
